mapco.title: New SQT Tool (CRAFT)
mapco.body:
## Overview

**CRAFT** (Custom Request And Fabrication Tracker) is a modern WPF desktop application for tracking custom fabrication jobs through a multi-department workflow at MAPCO. Built with .NET 8.0 and MVVM architecture, it integrates with Syspro ERP databases to provide real-time job tracking, department routing, and status management.

## Purpose

Replace manual tracking processes for custom fabrication jobs with a centralized system that:
- Tracks jobs from quote to shipment across SALES, PC (Production Control), and ENGINEERING departments
- Authenticates users via Windows credentials and maps them to departments based on Syspro GroupCodes
- Provides audit trails and timeline tracking for all job activities
- Manages drawing templates and technical documentation for jobs
- Prevents concurrent editing conflicts with multi-user job locking

## Key Features

### âœ… Completed

#### Core Functionality
- **Windows Authentication**: Auto-login via domain credentials (Environment.UserName)
- **Department Mapping**: Automatic department assignment (SALES/PC/ENGINEERING/ADMIN) from Syspro GroupCodes
- **Database Integration**: Connected to SysproCompanyB (job data) and Sysprodb (employee data)
- **Employee Caching**: 60-minute cache for performance optimization
- **MVVM Architecture**: Clean separation of UI and business logic

#### Job Management
- **Job Workflow Status Transitions**: QUOTE â†’ SOLD â†’ SHIPPED â†’ CANCELED with validation rules (#3)
- **Drawing Templates Feature**: Complete template library, upload/download, metadata management, search/filter (#4)
- **Job Filtering and Search**: Filter by status, department, assignee, dates with live search (#7)
- **Job Notes/Comments**: Collaboration system with timestamps and user attribution (#8)
- **Database Schema**: Production table/column names finalized and queries updated (#5)

#### Department Features
- **Department Dashboard Views**: Customized views for SALES, PC, ENGINEERING, and ADMIN users (#9)
- **Department Handoff Workflow**: Approval/rejection flows between departments
- **Timeline Tracking**: Visual timeline with alerts for key milestones

#### Multi-User Support
- **Multi-User Job Locking System**: 3-phase locking prevents concurrent editing conflicts (#13)
  - Phase 1: Lock acquisition/release with 30-minute expiration
  - Phase 2: Optimistic concurrency with RowVersion column
  - Phase 3: Real-time lock monitoring with visual warnings
- **Test Mode for Department Testing**: Safe testing environment with test users (#14)
  - Configuration-based user override
  - Visual test mode indicator (red banner)
  - Test users for all departments

#### Testing & Quality
- **Unit Testing Framework**: 75+ passing tests covering converters, services, and models (#12)
  - xUnit, FluentAssertions, Moq
  - Converter tests (39), Service tests (22), Model tests (14)
- **Testing Infrastructure**: Seq logging server on MAPCO-SPARE-DT4 (#11)
- **CRUD Operations**: Comprehensive end-to-end testing completed (#6)

#### Reporting
- **Basic Reporting**: Job metrics, completion times, department workload statistics (#10)

### ðŸ“‹ Planned (Future Enhancements)
- Export functionality (Excel, PDF reports)
- Email notifications for job status changes
- Customer portal for quote status tracking
- Mobile/web companion app
- Advanced analytics and forecasting

## Technical Stack

- **Framework**: .NET 8.0-windows
- **UI**: WPF with XAML
- **Architecture**: MVVM pattern
- **Database**: SQL Server (REDWOOD)
  - Job data: SysproCompanyB (Windows Auth)
  - Employee data: Sysprodb (SQL Auth)
- **ORM**: ADO.NET with Dapper
- **Logging**: Serilog with Seq integration
- **Testing**: xUnit, FluentAssertions, Moq
- **Dependencies**: Microsoft.Data.SqlClient, Microsoft.Data.Sqlite

## Project Structure

```
CRAFT/
â”œâ”€â”€ Models/                 # Data models (CustomJob, Employee, etc.)
â”œâ”€â”€ ViewModels/             # MVVM view models
â”œâ”€â”€ Views/                  # XAML UI templates
â”œâ”€â”€ Services/               # Business logic (SqlServerService, EmployeeService)
â”œâ”€â”€ Helpers/                # Utilities (ObservableObject, RelayCommand)
â”œâ”€â”€ Converters/             # XAML value converters
â”œâ”€â”€ Documentation/          # Project docs and guides
â”œâ”€â”€ MerrittCRAFT.Tests/    # Unit tests (75+ tests)
â””â”€â”€ MerrittCRAFT.IntegrationTests/  # Integration tests
```

## Current Status

**Version**: v1.0 - Beta  
**Phase**: Testing & Refinement  
**Deployment**: Ready for Pilot Testing  
**Health**: âœ… On Track - All Core Features Complete

See `Documentation/PROJECT_STATUS.md` for detailed status updates.

## Requirements

### Department Workflow
1. **SALES** creates job (QUOTE status)
2. **PC** reviews and processes (SOLD status)
3. **ENGINEERING** designs and approves
4. Final shipment tracking (SHIPPED status)

### User Roles
- **SALES**: SLSAP, SLSAPM group codes
- **PC**: PRDCFG, PRDDAT, PRDMGR, PRDPLN group codes
- **ENGINEERING**: ENGIN group code
- **ADMIN**: Full access to all features

### Technical Requirements
- Windows 10/11 (x64)
- Network access to REDWOOD SQL Server
- Windows domain authentication
- .NET 8.0 runtime (or self-contained deployment)

mti.title: TrailerQuoteMonitor - DriveWorks to REDWOOD Database Integration
mti.body:
## Overview
Windows Service that monitors BANYAN file server for new trailer quote folders from DriveWorks and automatically uploads quote data to REDWOOD database.

## Current Status
- Initial implementation complete
- Service monitors BANYAN DriveWorks Group Content Testing Specifications
- Processes QuoteInfo CSV files
- Trailer Options processing - pending data availability
- Inserts data into MEC_TrailerQuoteMaster and MEC_TrailerQuoteDetails tables
- Test mode available for manual quote processing
- CLAUDE.md documentation created

## Project Location
MTI-Programs/DriveWorksToQuoterUpload

## Technology Stack
- .NET 9.0 Windows Service
- CsvHelper for CSV processing
- SQL Server (REDWOOD/SysproCompanyT test database)
- FileSystemWatcher for real-time monitoring

## Key Features
- Automatic folder monitoring with pattern matching
- Atomic database transactions
- SqlBulkCopy for efficient detail record insertion
- Test mode for manual quote processing
- Comprehensive logging (Event Log + file logs)

## Related Projects
This is part 1 of the Pipedrive Integration project. A second program for the other direction of integration is planned.

## Next Steps
- Wait for Trailer Options data to be filled out
- Complete Trailer Options processing implementation
- Test with real quote data from DriveWorks
- Deploy to production server
- Configure as Windows Service
